adrFormatAddress: 51 Murray St PH6, New York, NY 10007, USA

originalText.text: We bought a photo shoot with Leshem Loft through a school auction and had the most amazing experience with them that we have had them photograph our family  many times since. Yaron’s photographs are pure art.  He has the most unbelievable eye and way of capturing our family.  My favorite day is seeing the photos and narrowing down to pick which we love the most.  Jenny and Yaron guide us through every step and give their opinions which helps because it’s hard to choose between so many wonderful ones.  They are helping curate which to put on on walls, or in a book.  It’s a one of a kind experience and truly an investment in art and capturing your family’s essence in that moment, forever.  Jenny is the best guide through it all.  As she says - if you don’t take them you won’t have them.  It’s worth it and then some!

originalText.text: Yaron Leshem captured our children in the most amazing portraits. He photographed them in both Aspen and the Hamptons. The photos are artistic and stunning. It was a pleasure working with him and with Jenny. From the photo sessions to hand selecting the special ones that are hanging in our home, the experience was fun and flawless. I cannot recommend them enough.

originalText.text: We had the best experience with Leshem Loft. Yaron's pictures of our family were unbelievable works of art. Jenny was fantastic to work with and she really guided us through the whole process. We couldn't be happier with our pictures and absolutely recommend Leshem Loft! We look forward to working with them on another shoot.

text.text: We had the best experience with Leshem Loft. Yaron's pictures of our family were unbelievable works of art. Jenny was fantastic to work with and she really guided us through the whole process. We couldn't be happier with our pictures and absolutely recommend Leshem Loft! We look forward to working with them on another shoot.

originalText.text: Leshem Loft flew down to Alabama to shoot my family and me this summer. They were the most kind, patient (3 small children), and friendly people! Their style is unlike any other. They have such an eye and it shows in their beautifully unique photographs. I would 100% recommend them to ANYONE!!!!! We have gotten so many compliments on our family portrait. It is our favorite, priceless piece of artwork.

originalText.text: We worked with the team at Leshem Loft on an AMAZING family photo shoot in the Hamptons.  The shoot was so much fun.  We had our family and our dogs.  Yaron took amazing photos and the results are stellar.  We feel so lucky to have worked with such an amazing photographer (his work is in museums!) and such a lovely team.  Jenny!  Maria!  The whole experience was fantastic and the photographs are works of art.  Definitely recommend!!!!
